page.title: 18Young Peoples' Groups,Yeovil
page.content:
{Guides.}I belong to St.Andrews Guides.It lasts from 7.00 till 9.00 on a Tuesday night.I find it very interesting because we go on hikes, play games,sing songs,go swimming etc. When we go to church,we parade through the town. Our guide uniform is a dark blue skirt,hat & a light blue blouse, with a maroon tie.I am in the Robin Patrol. Charlotte Wolfe.
{Crusaders.}Crusaders meet on Friday nights,when we play games like rounders,or do art or craft,& on Sunday mornings we study the Bible. Sometimes the leaders organize barbeques,or trips to the beach & each month we have a family service at Westfield School. This year Yeovil Crusaders are celebrating their 50th anniversay. Karen Shapland.
